title: nAyakA nAnun
sahitya:
nAyakA nAnun gAyakapriyai enda nALum ennai Alum prANa


anupallavi

  tAyum tandaiyum guru deivamum dhanamum ghanamum manamum Aghiya


caraNam    arumaiyAna kAdal vAzhvin anbum paNbum inba nalamum perumaiyAna 
peyarum pugazhum pEshiDAda periya sukhamum nIyE Atma nEyanAna
